scripts.feProd: npm run environmentProd && cd .. && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.fe: npm run environmentDev && cd .. && firebase emulators:start --only hosting,functions,firestore,auth,ui --import=./emulator-data --export-on-exit=./emulator-data
scripts.environmentProd: firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=production && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get
scripts.environmentDev: firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=development && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get
